plot: The life of Don Julián, a mad person who lived in Xochimilco, Mexico City. He collects any kind of dolls and gives them life through his diary and words.
title: La isla de las muñecas
plot_es: The life of Don Julián, a mad person who lived in Xochimilco, Mexico City. He collects any kind of dolls and gives them life through his diary and words.
plot_en: The life of Don Julián, a mad person who lived in Xochimilco, Mexico City. He collects any kind of dolls and gives them life through his diary and words.
